entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed areas this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
